entities.name: sirius black

entities.name: harry potter

entities.name: dumbledore

entities.name: ron weasley

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is present when Ron decides to keep the owl.

entities.name: crookshanks

entities.name: hogsmeade
